item.title: Ted Kaczynski has died
item.description: - Theodore Kaczynski, also known as the Unabomber, has died at the age of 81 in prison.

item.title: Debian 12 "Bookworm"
item.description: - Debian 12 "Bookworm" has been released after 1 year, 9 months, and 28 days of development.

item.title: MusicGen: Simple & controllable music generation
item.description: - MusicGen is a single language model that generates high-quality samples of compressed discrete music representations.

item.title: Mercedes beats Tesla to autonomous driving in California
item.description: - Mercedes-Benz is the first company authorized to sell or lease level-3 automated driving systems in California.

item.title: OBS merges WebRTC support
item.description: - OBS has added support for WebRTC.

item.title: Reddit bans subreddit detailing how to move to competitor Kbin
item.description: - The subreddit KbinMigration has been banned by Reddit due to spamming.

item.title: New York City will charge drivers going downtown
item.description: - Biden administration to allow New York City to toll vehicles entering Lower Manhattan, known as "congestion pricing" - First program of its kind in the United States, with proposals ranging from charging vehicles $9 to $23 during peak hours - Designed to reduce the number of vehicles entering the congestion zone by at least 10% every day, slash the number of miles cars travel within the zone by 5%, and generate revenue to fund $15 billion in future investments to modernize the city's public transit system

item.title: Emoji Kitchen
item.description: - Google's new feature called 'Emoji Kitchen' lets users mix and match various emojis to create new ones.

item.title: Barracuda urges replacing, not patching, its email security gateways
item.description: - Barracuda Networks is urging customers to replace, not patch, its email security gateways due to a zero-day vulnerability that caused a malware threat, compromising its email security appliances since October 2022.

item.title: GCP automatically lowered our quota, caused an incident, & refused to upgrade
